column4: hi i have a radeon 9600 on ubuntu hardy using the fglrx driver. i am playing with dual head and was wondering how to use radeon drivers instead of fglrx. is it as simple as changing xorg.conf to say radeon instead of fglrx?
Yes, it should be. There are also driver-specific options, but none should be necessary
Configuration for full, best, correct 3D support may require more
